paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Glu54Gln, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: hATTR with mixed axonal polyneuropathy and cardiomyopathy

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The entire hATTR group displayed mixed, axonal polyneuropathy and cardiomyopathy; 85.7% of them had CTS.
The patients displayed additional reduced muscle strength, some reaching stage 3A and 3B-PND at the end of the study.
The remaining patients exhibited the following changes: five patients (38.46%) progressed to stage 2.

functional_data.summary: The Glu54Gln variant is associated with significant impairment of nerve parameters.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families, especially in endemic regions.
variants.evidence_level: Moderate evidence based on clinical presentation and family segregation.
variants.additional_notes: The Glu54Gln mutation is the most common hATTR mutation encountered in Romania.
key_quotes: The Glu54Gln mutation is the most common hATTR mutation encountered in Romania.
The entire hATTR group displayed mixed, axonal polyneuropathy and cardiomyopathy.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text, focusing on the TTR gene.
